title: [Large-Scale] Enhanced Team-Based Learning (TBL) in Mathematics through Error-Insertion Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Skills and Experience Solving Mathematical Problems
context.additional_context: Learners participate to enhance daily-life mathematics application skills through thrice-weekly 20-minute microlearning sessions using digital devices (smartphones/tablets)

learning_goals: Learners enhance their critical analysis skills by collaboratively addressing error-insertion problems within teams.
Learners achieve an active interaction participation rate of 80% or higher during the Team-Based Learning (TBL) process.
Learners demonstrate conceptual application skills by achieving a 75% or higher accuracy rate in formative assessments through the module.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
